TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ObjectCreationDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ObjectCreationDelegate(aggregator As IntPtr) As IntPtr
type ObjectCreationDelegate = delegate of nativeint -> nativeint

param.name: aggregator
param.span: Puntero a la interfaz del objeto administrado.

span.span: A pointer to the managed object's interface.

returns.span: Un objeto representa la interfaz del objeto COM.

span.span: An object that represents the interface of the COM object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este delegado se llama para crear un objeto COM como una alternativa a `CoCreateInstance` cuando un objeto administrado necesita para crear una nueva instancia de su porción no administrada.This delegate is called to create a COM object as an alternative to `CoCreateInstance` when a managed object needs to create a new instance of its unmanaged portion. El `IUnknown` interfaz del objeto administrado se pasa como parámetro y el delegado debe devolver la `IUnknown` interfaz del objeto no administrado.The `IUnknown` interface of the managed object is passed as a parameter and the delegate should return the `IUnknown` interface of the unmanaged object. Ambas interfaces se pasan como un tipo para evitar el cálculo de referencias.Both interfaces are passed as type to avoid marshaling. Cada clase derivada de y tiene un constructor y un `Invoke` método.Every derived class of and has a constructor and an `Invoke` method.
